So it makes me sad that this torrent has no comments at all.  This is a great book.  A great copy too.  I'm about halfway and the advice given is really helpful, although you can skip a few chapters and get the same info from it 

Download for a good read, download for self improvement, download just to download, but this is a great book.
Here here NobeardTomo great book. The authors explores a wide range of topics, IE: Environmental, sociological, nutritional, toxicological and I have only read one third of the book.
